targets.query: SELECT mean("messageEpoch") AS "messageTime" FROM "streaming.HDFS-writer.writer" WHERE "process" = 'hdfs-events-writer-task' AND "dataSource" =~ /^$dataSource$/ AND "lastStep" =~ /^$lastStep$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "dataSource", "lastStep" fill(null)
